titleStmt.title: Beautifull Moggy: or, Scotch Jemmy's delight· Being a brief account of a late wooing and wedding at the city of Edinborough. To the tune of The female trooper. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, and J[ohn]. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Publishers' names, place and date of publication suggested by Wing
Verse: "Moggy full as blithe and gay ..."
